scripts.dtb: ./dist/src/cli.js oas2dtb -i example/openapi/openapi.yaml -o example/dtb && npm run check:ex
scripts.rtb: ./dist/src/cli.js oas2rtb -i example/openapi/openapi.yaml -o example/rtb && npm run check:ex
scripts.tbd:dev: node --experimental-strip-types src/cli.ts oas2tb -i example/openapi/openapi.yaml -o example/tb-d && npm run check:ex
scripts.tbr:dev: node --experimental-strip-types src/cli.ts oas2tb -i example/openapi/openapi.yaml -o example/tb-r --keeprefs --extension js && npm run check:ex
scripts.tbdkeys:dev: node --experimental-strip-types src/cli.ts oas2tb -i example/openapi/openapi.yaml -o example/tb-keys --keepanno --ajvunsafe && npm run check:ex
scripts.rod:dev: node --experimental-strip-types src/cli.ts oas2ro -i example/openapi/openapi.yaml -o example/rod --deref && npm run check:ex
scripts.ror:dev: node --experimental-strip-types src/cli.ts oas2ro -i example/openapi/openapi.yaml -o example/ror && npm run check:ex
scripts.lint: npm run lint:only && npm run lint:typecheck

lint-staged.*.{js,ts,mjs,mts}: npm run format && npm run lint
